item.title: #TIL : Critical notice of string DOM manipulation using jQuery
item.description: Critical notice of string DOM manipulation using jQuery Sometimes you want to manipulate the HTML DOM elements inside as a string, then you found a lot of HTML parser or DOM library from the Internet (but it supports only NodeJS).

item.title: #TIL : View function source in developer tool console
item.description: View function source in developer tool console If you are in console of developer tool and you want to know what the function does, you can view its source by:

item.title: #TIL : View all parameters passed to callback function without reading docs
item.description: View all parameters passed to callback function without reading docs Time before, I often meet the situation that I forgot the parameters pass to a function (so I have to searching the API docs to read via Google).

item.title: #TIL : Detect HTTP Response 304 Status Code in AJAX
item.description: Detect HTTP Response 304 Status Code in AJAX Sometimes, you have a interval timer to retrieve new data updates from AJAX requests.

item.title: #TIL : Trigger event after setting val in jQuery
item.description: Trigger event after setting val in jQuery After setting value of an input via val method, we should call the change chaining method to trigger the onChange event of element.

item.title: #TIL : Tracking changes of cookie on webpage
item.description: Tracking changes of cookie on webpage Using Object.defineProperty helper function as I wrote 3 days ago.

item.title: #TIL : Bypass CORS by using JSONP callback
item.description: Bypass CORS by using JSONP callback Sometimes you are blocked from request a cross-origin resource. Instead of adding our domain to allowed list of them, we can use another way to retrieve data from their API by using JSONP (in case they support it).

item.title: #TIL : Debug js code using console.trace
item.description: Debug js code using console.trace Browsers provide an useful function help you debug easier than using simple console.

item.title: #TIL : Define property of an object in hacking way
item.description: Define property of an object in hacking way Sometimes, we want to define a property of an advanced object (has setter and getter function).

item.title: #TIL : Eval function and with block
item.description: Eval function and with block JS code will be slower if engine detects any of ‘eval’ function or ‘with’ block b/c compiler stop optimizing the code
